name: The Two-Button Mage
description:
This game was created by me during the 2Buttons Game Jam of the FH BFI Vienna. 

The core concept of the game is simple. You are a mage, fighting against little monsters, slinging spells left and right two defend yourself...two buttons at a time. 

With button combinations of two, you get to choose your spell element, strength and shape. 

See how much you can score before you get overwhelmed!

The 3D assets, spells and animations were not created by me. They are free assets from the Unity Asset Store.
